COMMENTS: Description of datasets available for CMCT comparisons

icesat-cmctnc-tpelev-ant.desc: ICESat GLAS elevations, T/P ellipsoid, Antarctica, CMCT netCDF

icesat-cmctnc-wgselev-ant.desc: ICESat GLAS elevations, WGS84 ellipsoid, Antarctica, CMCT netCDF

icesat-cmctnc-egmmtelev-ant.desc: ICESat GLAS elevations, EGM08 mean-tide, Antarctica, CMCT netCDF

icesat-cmctnc-egmtfelev-ant.desc: ICESat GLAS elevations, EGM08 tide-free, Antarctica, CMCT netCDF
